text: LPS induction of <extra_id_0> SerpinB2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA and protein expression in murine macrophage cells .
RAW264.7 macrophages were treated for the indicated times with 100 ng / ml LPS .
( A ) qPCR analysis of murine <extra_id_0> SerpinB2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA levels , relative to <extra_id_0> beta-actin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
The plot is representative of at least two independent experiments performed in triplicate .
( B ) Immunoblot analysis of <extra_id_0> SerpinB2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> protein expression in whole cell lysates .
Blot was reprobed for <extra_id_0> GAPDH <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> as a loading control .
